'''John Jethro Rashbold''' (born in [[1965]]) was a member of the [[Notion Club]].

== History ==
John Jethro Rashbold was an undergraduate at [[wikipedia:Magdalen College, Oxford|Magdalen College]] in [[Oxford]]. He was a classical scholar and an apprentice poet. He was introduced to the [[Notion Club]] by [[Philip Frankley]], to whom he was much attached.<ref>{{SD|2b}}</ref>

== Inspiration ==
The name ''Rashbold'' is a play on [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s own surname. It is a rough translation of ''Tolkien'' (from [[wikipedia:German language|German]] ''Toll-k√ºhn'') which means "foolhardy".<ref>{{SD|2a}}</ref><ref>{{L|165}}</ref>
